description: This file defines the main ScheduleManager React component for a scheduling UI. It manages calendar views, real-time WebSocket connections, resource and event selection, and interactions like creating and moving cases. It composes several subcomponents like Sidebar, Calendar, and RightPanel to build a three-panel scheduler interface with live updates and keyboard shortcuts.

methods.name: ScheduleManager
methods.description: Main React component managing the scheduling interface, state, effects, and event handlers.
